titleStmt.title: Colonel Huson's (or the cobler's) confession in a fit of despair, taken in short-hand by the pen of a ready-writer.
titleStmt.author: Hewson, John, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Hewson by Wing, but given title main entry by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Item at reel position 1333:7 identified as Wing H1644 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the British Library.
